title: Sonic Mania - Unofficial COMPLETE Soundtrack
description:
-= Sonic Mania - The Unofficial COMPLETE Soundtrack =-

Wow, this game has an AMAZING soundtrack! Unfortunately, there is no commercially available OST besides a limited edition vinyl release that only contains a handful of tracks. 

"Alexthegrand" did us all a solid by recording the soundtrack via the sound test screen in-game, but the quality of this recording is TERRIBLE!

I decided to personally take matters into my own hands. I ripped the OGG files directly from the game assets and spent several hours manually looping them myself.

The end result is 61 beautiful-quality tracks that includes everything in alexthegrand's rip AS WELL AS additional tracks found only in the assets and not in the sound test!

I don't condone pirating this game or this soundtrack, but until the soundtrack is commercially available, I believe anyone who owns the game has the right to own a best-quality rip of the soundtrack.

Oh, and this is the first torrent I have ever seeded and submitted myself... yes, I ripped the music, looped it, converted to MP3 at max quality, and even uploaded the torrent myself. I really do hope folks find this and enjoy the fruits of my labor!

Of course none of this would be possible without the almighty Tee Lopes... that man is a god!

Thanks everyone, and enjoy!

-rchrdcrg


PS - FWIW, I write game music too! Check it out at
